title: Kaattu Chedikku Lyrics Pathinaaru Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Karthik Raja
Song: Kaattu Chedikku
Lyrics : Snehan
Movie Name : Pathinaaru

Kaattu Chedikku kaval kidachache
Kaatu-kulla paadam padichache
Romba palaya ulagam
Ippa pudhusa theriyudhey
Adi aathi idndha rathathirku perenna
Idhu anbu thaane verenna

Kaattu Chedikku kaval kidachache
Kaatu-kulla paadam padichache

Paruthi panja pola manasu
Pacha thanni pola vayasu
Paasam thavira yedhum theriyadhe..
Poigal illa veru ulagam
Poti indri nenjam palagum
Vanmurai-ku velai kidayadhe...
Uppu moota erikondu
oora suthi parkum podhu
Thappu thanda edhum indri
Payanam thodarudhe

Adi aathi manam thuli thuli kudikudhe
sudhi yethi dhinam kathu-pola parakudhe

Pallikooda padam namaku
Sollidadha vazhkai iruku
Andha padam ingae nadakiradhe
Anbu onre sami kanaku
Adhuku eedu enna iruku
Kodutham vaangum manidham jeikiradhe...
Otha paruka aanapodhum
Paguthu unnum nenjam thaan
Kadhal indri kadhalodu
Magizhum manasuthaan

Adi aathi rendum vetkapattu sirikdhe
Sugam yethi ellai thaandi parakudhe

Kaattu Chedikku kaval kidachache
Kaatu-kulla paadam padichache
